project.name: OsmAPP
project.description: A universal OpenStreetMap browser with editing capability

tags.description: Shows a detail of any feature. Displays its name and all other tags. It lets the user edit it. See eg.: https://osmapp.org/relation/6706848
Shows feature image, see eg.: https://osmapp.org/relation/6706848
Shows parsed hours and also lets the user edit it.
